text: The women's K-1 500 metres competition at the 2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Szeged took place at the Olympic Centre of Szeged. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | Friday 23 August 2019 || 09:00 || Heats |- | Saturday 24 August 2019 || 15:00 || Semifinals |- | rowspan=3|Sunday 25 August 2019 || 10:20 || Final C |- | 10:26 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 11:44 ||style=background:lemonchiffon| Final A |} All times are Central European Summer Time (UTC+2) ==Results== ===Heats=== The five fastest boats in each heat, plus |} ===Semifinals=== Qualification in each semi was as follows: The fastest three boats advanced to the A final. The next three fastest boats advanced to the B final. The seventh, eighth and ninth-place boats advanced to the C final. ====Semifinal 1==== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Rank !Kayaker !Country !Time !Notes |-bgcolor=bbffbb | 1 |
